title: Bianchi Gains New Lif-e with e-Omnia ebike line headed for the U.S.
content:
“A new vision.” That’s a bold statement for any brand to make, let alone the oldest bicycle manufacturer in the world. Now 136 years old, Bianchi was there before pneumatic tires were a thing. They also produced motorcycles for decades, and even cars under the Autobianchi marque which was a joint venture between Bianchi, Pirelli, […]

The post Bianchi Gains New Lif-e with e-Omnia ebike line headed for the U.S. appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
